T10TD4182E:40b-3: bshes pa'i spring yig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:40b-4: yon tan rang bzhin dge 'os bdag gis ni //
T10TD4182E:40b-5: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung bsnyad las byung ba'i //
T10TD4182E:40b-6: bsod nams 'dun slad 'phags pa'i dbyangs 'di dag / cung zad cig bsdebs khyod kyis gsan pa'i rigs //
T10TD4182E:40b-7: ji ltar bde gshegs sku gzugs shing las kyang //
T10TD4182E:40b-8: bgyis pa ci 'dra 'ang rung ste mkhas pas mchod //
T10TD4182E:40b-9: de bzhin bdag gi snyan ngag 'di ngan yang //
T10TD4182E:40b-10: dam chos brjod la brten slad smad mi bgyi //
T10TD4182E:40b-11: thub pa chen po'i bka' ni sman dgu zhig ;
T10TD4182E:40b-12: / khyod kyi thugs su lta yang chud mod kyi //
T10TD4182E:40b-13: rdo thal las bgyis dgung zla'i 'od kyis ni //
T10TD4182E:40b-14: ches dkar nyid du ci ste mi bgyid lags //
T10TD4182E:40b-15: rgyal bas sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T10TD4182E:40b-16: gtong dang tshul khrims lha rjes dran pa drug / rab tu bka' stsal de dag so so yi //
T10TD4182E:41a-0: @41a * // yon tan tshogs kyis rjes su dran par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:41a-1: dge ba'i las lam bcu po lus dang ni //
T10TD4182E:41a-2: ngag dang yid kyis rtag tu bsten bgyi zhing //
T10TD4182E:41a-3: chang rnams las ldog de bzhin dge ba yi //
T10TD4182E:41a-4: 'tsho ba la yang mngon par dgyes par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:41a-5: longs spyod g-yo ba snying po med mkhyen nas /
T10TD4182E:41a-6: dge slong gram ze bkren dang bshes rnams la //
T10TD4182E:41a-7: sbyin pa tshul bzhin stsal bgyi pha rol du //
T10TD4182E:41a-8: sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog ma mchis so //
T10TD4182E:41a-9: khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams mod mi dma' //
T10TD4182E:41a-10: ma 'dres ma sbags pa dag bsten par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:41a-11: khrims ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sa bzhin du //
T10TD4182E:41a-12: yon tan kun gyi gzhi rten lags par gsungs //
T10TD4182E:41a-13: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson bsam gtan dang //
T10TD4182E:41a-14: de bzhin shes rab gzhal med pha rol phyin //
T10TD4182E:41a-15: 'di dag rgyas mdzod srid pa'i rgya mtsho yi //
T10TD4182E:41a-16: pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i dbang po mdzod //
T10TD4182E:41a-17: gang la pha dang ma dag mchod byed pa'i //
T10TD4182E:41a-18: rigs de tshangs bcas slob dpon bcas pa'ang lags //
T10TD4182E:41a-19: de dag la mchod grags par 'gyur ba dang //
T10TD4182E:41a-20: slad ma la yang mtho ris 'gyur ba lags //
T10TD4182E:41a-21: 'tshe dang chom rkun 'khrig pa brdzun dang ni //
T10TD4182E:41a-22: chang dang dus min zas la chags pa dang //
T10TD4182E:41a-23: mal stan mtho la dga' dang glu dag dang //
T10TD4182E:41a-24: gar dang phreng ba'i khyad par rnams spong zhing //
T10TD4182E:41a-25: dgra bcom tshul khrims rjes su byed pa yi //
T10TD4182E:41a-26: yan lag brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na //
T10TD4182E:41a-27: gso sbyong 'dod spyod lha lus yid 'ong ba //
T10TD4182E:41a-28: skyes pa bud med dag la stsol bar bgyid //
T10TD4182E:41a-29: ser sna g-yo sgyu chags dang snyom las dang //
T10TD4182E:41a-30: mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'dod chags zhe sdang dang //
T10TD4182E:41a-31: rigs dang gzugs dang thos pa lang tsho dang //
T10TD4182E:41a-32: dbang thad che bas rgyags pa dgra bzhin gzigs //
T10TD4182E:41a-33: bag yod bdud rtsi'i gnas te bag med pa //
T10TD4182E:41a-34: 'chi ba'i gnas su thub pas bka' stsal to //
T10TD4182E:41a-35: de bas khyod kyi dge chos spel slad du //
T10TD4182E:41a-36: gus pas rtag tu bag dang bcas par mdzo //
T10TD4182E:41a-37: gang zhig sngon chad bag med gyur pa la //
T10TD4182E:41a-38: phyi nas bag dang ldan par gyur te yang //
T10TD4182E:41a-39: zla ba sprin bral lta bur rnam mdzes te //
T10TD4182E:41a-40: dga' bo sor phreng mthong ldan bde byed bzhin //
T10TD4182E:41b-0: @41b 'di ltar bzod mtshungs dka' thub ma mchis pas //
T10TD4182E:41b-1: khyod kyis khro ba'i go skabs dbye mi bgyi //
T10TD4182E:41b-2: khro ba spangs pas phyir mi ldog pa nyid //
T10TD4182E:41b-3: 'thob par 'gyur bar sangs rgyas zhal gyis bzhes //
T10TD4182E:41b-4: bdag ni 'dis spyos 'dis gtag pham par byas //
T10TD4182E:41b-5: 'di yis bdag gi nor phrogs gyur te zhes /
T10TD4182E:41b-6: khon du 'dzin pas 'khrug long rnam bskyed de //
T10TD4182E:41b-7: khon 'dzin rnam spangs bde bar gnyid kyis log / sems can chu dang sa dang rdo ba la //
T10TD4182E:41b-8: ri mo bris pa de 'drar rig par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:41b-9: de'i nang nyon mongs can la dang po ni //
T10TD4182E:41b-10: mchog ste chos 'dod rnams la tha ma la gas //
T10TD4182E:41b-11: rgyal bas snying la 'bab dang bden pa dang //
T10TD4182E:41b-12: log par smra ldan skyes bu rnams kyi ni //
T10TD4182E:41b-13: sbrang rtsi me tog mi gtsang lta bu'i tshig / rnam gsum bka' stsal de las tha ma spang //
T10TD4182E:41b-14: snang nas snang ba'i mthar thug mun pa nas //
T10TD4182E:41b-15: mun pa'i mthar thug snang nas mun mthar thug / mun nas snang ba'i mthar thug gang zag ni ;
T10TD4182E:41b-16: / gzhi ste de dag rnams kyi ngang por mdzod //
T10TD4182E:41b-17: mi ni aa mra'i 'bras bzhin ma smin la //
T10TD4182E:41b-18: smin pa dang 'dra smin la ma smin 'dra //
T10TD4182E:41b-19: ma smin ma smin par snang smin la ni //
T10TD4182E:41b-20: smin par snang zhes bgyi ba 'drar rtogs mdzod //
T10TD4182E:41b-21: gzhan gyi chung ma mi lta mthong na yang //
T10TD4182E:41b-22: na tshod mthun par ma dang bu mo dang ;
T10TD4182E:41b-23: / srid mo'i 'du shes bskyed bgyi chags gyur na //
T10TD4182E:41b-24: mi gtsang nyid du yang dag bsam par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:41b-25: g-yo ba'i sems ni thos mtshungs bu lta bur //
T10TD4182E:41b-26: gter bzhin srog dang 'dra bar bsrung bgyi ste //
T10TD4182E:41b-27: gdug pa dug dang mtshon dang dgra bo dang //
T10TD4182E:41b-28: me bzhin 'dod ba'i bde la yid 'byung mdzod ;
T10TD4182E:41b-29: /'dod pa rnams ni phung khrol bskyed pa ste //
T10TD4182E:41b-30: rgyal ba'i dbang pos kimp'i 'bras 'drar gsungs //
T10TD4182E:41b-31: de dag spang bgyi de yi lcags sgrog gis //
T10TD4182E:41b-32: 'khor ba'i brtson rar 'jig rten 'di dag bcings //
T10TD4182E:41b-33: gang dag dbang po drug yul rnams la ni //
T10TD4182E:41b-34: rtag tu mi brten g-yo dang gang dag cig / g-yul ngor dgra tshogs la sa rgyal de dag las //
T10TD4182E:41b-35: mkhas rnams dang po dpa' rab lags par 'tshal //
T10TD4182E:41b-36: bud med gzhon nu'i lus ni logs shig tu //
T10TD4182E:41b-37: dri nga ba dang sgo dgu dod pa dang //
T10TD4182E:41b-38: mi gtsang kun snod 'dra ba dgang dka' dang //
T10TD4182E:42a-0: pags pas g-yogs dang rgyan yang @42a * //
T10TD4182E:42a-2: ji ltar mdze can srin bus nyen pa ni //
T10TD4182E:42a-3: bde ba'i don du me la kun bstan kyang //
T10TD4182E:42a-4: zhi bar mi 'gyur de dang 'dra bar ni //
T10TD4182E:42a-5: 'dod pa rnams la chags pa'ang mkhyen bar mdzod //
T10TD4182E:42a-6: don dam gzigs par bgyi slad dngos rnams la //
T10TD4182E:42a-7: tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa de goms mdzod //
T10TD4182E:42a-8: de dang 'dra bar yon tan ldan pa yi //
T10TD4182E:42a-9: chos gzhan 'ga' yang mchis pa ma lags so //
T10TD4182E:42a-10: skyes bu rigs gzugs thos dang ldan rnams kyang //
T10TD4182E:42a-11: shas rab tshul khrims bral ba bkur ma lags //
T10TD4182E:42a-12: de ltas gang la yon tan 'di gnyis ldan ;
T10TD4182E:42a-13: / de ni yon tan gzhan dang bral yang mchod //
T10TD4182E:42a-14: 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnyed dang ma rnyed dang //
T10TD4182E:42a-15: bde dang mi bde snyan dang mi snyan dan //
T10TD4182E:42a-16: bstod smad ces bgyi 'jig rten chos brgyad po //
T10TD4182E:42a-17: bdag gi yid yul min par mgo snyoms mdzod //
T10TD4182E:42a-18: khyod kyis bram ze dge slong lha dang ni //
T10TD4182E:42a-19: mgron dang yab yum dag ngang btsun mo dang //
T10TD4182E:42a-20: 'khor gyi slad du'ang sdig pa mi bgyi ste //
T10TD4182E:42a-21: dmyal ba'i rnam smin skal nod 'ga' ma mchis //
T10TD4182E:42a-22: sdig pa'i las rnams spyad pa 'ga' yang ni //
T10TD4182E:42a-23: de yi mod la mtshon bzhin mi gcod kyang //
T10TD4182E:42a-24: 'chi ba'i dus la bab na sdig pa yi //
T10TD4182E:42a-25: las kyi 'bras bu gang lags mngon par 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:42a-26: dad dang tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang //
T10TD4182E:42a-27: dri med ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod dang //
T10TD4182E:42a-28: shes rab nor bdun lags par thub pas gsungs //
T10TD4182E:42a-29: nor gzhan phal pa don ma mchis rtogs mdzod //
T10TD4182E:42a-30: rgyan po 'gyed dang 'dus la lta ba dang //
T10TD4182E:42a-31: le lo sdig pa'i grogs la brten pa dang //
T10TD4182E:42a-32: chang dang mtshan mo rgyu ba ngan song ba //
T10TD4182E:42a-33: grags pa nyams bar 'gyur ba de drug spang //
T10TD4182E:42a-34: nor rnams kun gyi nang na chog shes pa //
T10TD4182E:42a-35: rab mchog lags par lha mi'i ston pas gsungs //
T10TD4182E:42a-36: kun du chog shes mdzod cig chog mkhyen na //
T10TD4182E:42a-37: nor mi bdog kyang yang dag 'byor pa lags //
T10TD4182E:42a-38: des pa bdog mang ji ltar sdug bsngal ba //
T10TD4182E:42a-39: 'dod pa chung rnams de lta ma lags te //
T10TD4182E:42a-40: klu mchog rnams la mgo bo ji snyed pa //
T10TD4182E:42a-41: de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal de snyed do //
T10TD4182E:42a-42: rang bzhin dgrar 'brel gshed ma lta bu dang /
T10TD4182E:42b-0: khyim thab brnyas @42b bgyid rje mo lta bu dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-1: chung ngu'ang rku ba chom rkun lta bu yi //
T10TD4182E:42b-2: chung ma gsum po de dag rnam par spang //
T10TD4182E:42b-3: srid mo lta bur rjes mthun gang yin dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-4: mdza' mo bzhin du snying la 'bab pa dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-5: ma bzhin phan par 'dod dang bran mo bzhin //
T10TD4182E:42b-6: dbang gyur gang yin rigs kyi lha bzhin bkur ;
T10TD4182E:42b-7: / kha zas sman dang 'dra bar rigs pa yis //
T10TD4182E:42b-8: 'dod chags zhe sdad med par bsten bgyi ste //
T10TD4182E:42b-9: rgyags phyir ma lags bsnyems pa'i phyir ma lags //
T10TD4182E:42b-10: 'tshag phyi ma lags lus gnas 'ba' zhig phyir //
T10TD4182E:42b-11: rig pa'i bdag nyid nyin par mtha' dag dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-12: mtshan mo thun gyi stod smad bzlas nas ni //
T10TD4182E:42b-13: mnal tshe'ang 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar //
T10TD4182E:42b-14: dran dang ldan bar de dag bar du mnol //
T10TD4182E:42b-15: byams dang snying rje dag dang dga' ba dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-16: btang snyoms rtag tu yang dag bsgom mdzod cig / gong ma brnyes par ma gyur de lta na'ang /
T10TD4182E:42b-17: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bde ba thob par 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:42b-18: 'dod spyo dga' dang bde dang sdug bsngal dag / rnam par spangs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi po yis //
T10TD4182E:42b-19: tshangs dang 'od gsal dag dang dge rgyas dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-20: 'bras bu che lha rnams dang skal mnyam thob //
T10TD4182E:42b-21: rtag dang mngon par zhen dang gnyen po med //
T10TD4182E:42b-22: yon tan gtso ldan bzhi las byung ba'i las //
T10TD4182E:42b-23: dge dang mi dge rnam lba chen po ste //
T10TD4182E:42b-24: de bas dge ba spyod la ba rtson par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:42b-25: lan tshva srang 'gas chu ni nyung du zhig / ro bskyur bgyid kyi gangg'a'i klung min ltar //
T10TD4182E:42b-26: de bzhin sdig pa'i las ni chung du yang //
T10TD4182E:42b-27: dge ba'i rtsa ba yang la mkhyen par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:42b-28: rgod dang 'gyod dang gnod sems rmugs pa dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-29: gnyid dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste //
T10TD4182E:42b-30: sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dge ba'i nor //
T10TD4182E:42b-31: 'phrog pa'i chom rkun lags par mkhyen par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:42b-32: dad dang brtson 'grus dag dang dran pa dang //
T10TD4182E:42b-33: ting 'dzin shes rab chos mchog lnga nyid de //
T10TD4182E:42b-34: 'di la mngon brtson mdzod cig 'di dag ni //
T10TD4182E:42b-35: stobs dbang zhes bgyi rtse mor gyur pa'ang lags //
T10TD4182E:42b-36: na rga 'chi sdug bral dang de bzhin du //
T10TD4182E:42b-37: las ni bdag gir byas las ma 'das zhes //
T10TD4182E:42b-38: de ltar yang dang yang du sems pa ni //
T10TD4182E:42b-39: de yi gnyen po'i sgo nas rgyags mi 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:43a-0: @43a * // gal te mtho ris thar pa mngon bzhed na //
T10TD4182E:43a-1: yang dag lta la goms pa nyid du mdzod //
T10TD4182E:43a-2: gang zag log par lta bas legs spyad kyang //
T10TD4182E:43a-3: thams cad rnam par smin pa mi bzad ldan //
T10TD4182E:43a-4: mi ni yang dag nyid du mi bde zhing //
T10TD4182E:43a-5: mi rtag bdag med mi gtsang rig par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:43a-6: dran pa nye bar ma bzhag rnams kyis ni //
T10TD4182E:43a-7: phyin ci log bzhir lta ba phung khrol ba //
T10TD4182E:43a-8: gzugs ni bdag ma yin zhes gsungs te bdag / gzugs dang mi ldan gzugs la bdag nas min //
T10TD4182E:43a-9: bdag la gzugs mi gnas te de bzhin du //
T10TD4182E:43a-10: phung bo lhag ma bzhi yang stong rtogs bgyi //
T10TD4182E:43a-11: phung bo 'dod rgyal las min dus las min //
T10TD4182E:43a-12: rang bzhin las min ngo bo nyid las min //
T10TD4182E:43a-13: dbang phyug las min rgyu med can min te //
T10TD4182E:43a-14: mi shes las dang sred las byung rig mdzod //
T10TD4182E:43a-15: tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin rang lus la //
T10TD4182E:43a-16: phyin ci log par lta dang the tshom ste //
T10TD4182E:43a-17: kun du sbyor ba 'di gsum thar pa yi //
T10TD4182E:43a-18: grong khyer sgo 'gegs lags par mkhyen par gyis //
T10TD4182E:43a-19: thar pa bdag la rag las 'di la ni //
T10TD4182E:43a-20: gzhan gyis grogs bgyir ci yang ma mchis pas //
T10TD4182E:43a-21: thos dang tshul khrims bsam gtan ldan pa yis //
T10TD4182E:43a-22: bden pa rnam pa bzhi la 'bad par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:43a-23: lhag pa'i tshul khrims lhag pa'i shes rab dang ;
T10TD4182E:43a-24: / lhag pa'i sems la rtag tu bslab par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:43a-25: bslab pa brgya rtsa lnga bcu lhag cig ni //
T10TD4182E:43a-26: gsum po 'di nang yang dag 'du bar 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:43a-27: dbang phyug lus rtog dran pa bde gshegs kyis //
T10TD4182E:43a-28: bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam du nye bar bstan //
T10TD4182E:43a-29: de ni bsgrims nas mngon par bsrung bgyi ste //
T10TD4182E:43a-30: dran pa nyams pas chos kun 'jig par 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:43a-31: tshe ni gnod mang rlung gis btab pa yi //
T10TD4182E:43a-32: chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na //
T10TD4182E:43a-33: dbugs rdub dbugs 'byung gnyid kyis log pa las //
T10TD4182E:43a-34: sad khom gang lags de ni ngo mtshar tshe //
T10TD4182E:43a-35: lus mtha' thal ba mthar skam mthar 'drul zhing //
T10TD4182E:43a-36: tha mar mi gtsang snying po ma mchis pa //
T10TD4182E:43a-37: rnam par 'jig dengs myags par 'gyur ba ste //
T10TD4182E:43a-38: so sor 'gyes chos can du mkhyen par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:43a-39: sa dang lhun po rgya mtsho nyi ma bdun //
T10TD4182E:43a-40: 'bar bas bsregs pa'i lus can 'di dag kyang /
T10TD4182E:43a-41: thal ba yang ni lus par mi 'gyur na //
T10TD4182E:43b-0: shin tu nyam chung mi lta @43b smos ci 'tshal //
T10TD4182E:43b-1: de ltar 'di kun mi rtag bdag med de //
T10TD4182E:43b-2: skyabs med mgon med gnas med de slad du //
T10TD4182E:43b-3: 'khor ba chu shing snying po med pa las //
T10TD4182E:43b-4: mi mchog khyod kyi thugs ni dbyung bar mdzod //
T10TD4182E:43b-5: rgya mtsho gcig gnas gnya' shing bu ga dang //
T10TD4182E:43b-6: rus sbal phrad pa bas kyang dud 'gro las //
T10TD4182E:43b-7: mi nyid ches thob dka' bas mi dbang gis //
T10TD4182E:43b-8: dam chos spyod pas de 'bras mchis par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:43b-9: gang zhig gser snod rin chen spras pa yis //
T10TD4182E:43b-10: ngan skyugs 'phyags par bgyid pa de bas ni //
T10TD4182E:43b-11: gang zhig mi ru skyes nas sdig pa dag / bgyid pa de ni ches rab blun pa lags //
T10TD4182E:43b-12: mthun par gyur pa'i yul du gnas pa dang //
T10TD4182E:43b-13: skyes bu dam pa la ni brten pa dang //
T10TD4182E:43b-14: bdag nyid legs smon sngon yang bsod nams bgyis //
T10TD4182E:43b-15: 'khor lo chen po bzhi ni khyod la mnga' //
T10TD4182E:43b-16: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa tshangs par spyod //
T10TD4182E:43b-17: yongs su rdzogs pa thub bas gsungs de'i phyir //
T10TD4182E:43b-18: skyes bu dam pa bsten bgyi rgyal ba la //
T10TD4182E:43b-19: brten nas rab tu mang pos zhi ba thob //
T10TD4182E:43b-20: log par lta ba 'dzin dang dud 'gro dang //
T10TD4182E:43b-21: yi dags nyid dang dmyal bar skye ba dang //
T10TD4182E:43b-22: rgyal ba'i bka' med pa dang mtha' 'khob tu //
T10TD4182E:43b-23: kla klor skye dang glen zhing lkugs pa nyid //
T10TD4182E:43b-24: tshe ring lha nyid gang yang rung bar ni //
T10TD4182E:43b-25: skye ba zhes bgyi mi khom skyon brgyad po //
T10TD4182E:43b-26: de dag dang bral khom pa rnyed nas ni //
T10TD4182E:43b-27: skye ba bzlog pa'i slad du 'bad par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:43b-28: des pa 'dod pas phongs dang 'chi ba dang /
T10TD4182E:43b-29: na dang rga sogs sdug bsngal du ma yi //
T10TD4182E:43b-30: 'byung gnas 'khor ba la ni skyo mdzad cing //
T10TD4182E:43b-31: 'di yi nyes pa'i shas kyang gsan par mdzod ;
T10TD4182E:43b-32: / pha ni bu nyid ma ni chung ma nyid //
T10TD4182E:43b-33: skye bo dgrar gyur pa dag bshes nyid dang /
T10TD4182E:43b-34: bzlog pa nyid du mchi bas de slad du //
T10TD4182E:43b-35: 'khor ba dag na nges pa 'ga' ma mchis //
T10TD4182E:43b-36: re res rgya mtsho bzhi bas lhag pa yi //
T10TD4182E:43b-37: 'o ma 'thungs te da dung so so yi //
T10TD4182E:43b-38: skye bo'i rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor ba pas //
T10TD4182E:43b-39: de bas chos mang nyid cig btung 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:43b-40: re re'i bdag nyid rus pa'i phung po ni //
T10TD4182E:43b-41: lhun po mnyam pa snyed cig 'das gyur te //
T10TD4182E:43b-42: ma yi thug mtha' rgya shug tshi gu tsam //
T10TD4182E:43b-43: ri lur ba grangs kyang sa yis lang mi 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:43b-44: brgya byin 'jig rten mchod 'os gyur nas ni //
T10TD4182E:44a-0: las kyi dbang gis phyir yang @44a * //
T10TD4182E:44a-2: 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du gyur nas kyang //
T10TD4182E:44a-3: 'khor ba dag tu yang bran nyid du 'gyur /
T10TD4182E:44a-4: mtho ris bu mo'i nu ma rked ba la //
T10TD4182E:44a-5: reg pa'i bde ba yun ring myong nas slar //
T10TD4182E:44a-6: dmyal bar 'thag gcod dbang ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyis //
T10TD4182E:44a-7: reg pa shin tu mi bzad bsten 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:44a-8: rkang pa'i reg pas nem par bde bzod pa //
T10TD4182E:44a-9: lhun po'i spo la yun ring gnas nas ni //
T10TD4182E:44a-10: slar yang me mur ro myag rgyu ba yi //
T10TD4182E:44a-11: sdug bsngal mi bzad phog snyam bgyid 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:44a-12: mtho ris bu mos 'brongs shing dga' ba dang /
T10TD4182E:44a-13: rnam par mdzes 'tshal son par rtses nas slar //
T10TD4182E:44a-14: 'dab ma ral gri 'dra tshal nags rnams kyis //
T10TD4182E:44a-15: rkang lag rna ba sna gcod 'thob par 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:44a-16: dal gyis 'bab pa lha yi bu mo ni //
T10TD4182E:44a-17: gdong mdzes gser gyi padma lhan bzhugs nas //
T10TD4182E:44a-18: slar yang dmyal ba'i chu bo rab med par //
T10TD4182E:44a-19: tsha sgo bzod brlag chu tshan 'jug 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:44a-20: lha yul 'dod bde shin tu chen po dang /
T10TD4182E:44a-21: tshangs nyid chags bral bde ba thob nas slar //
T10TD4182E:44a-22: mnar med me yi bud shing gyur pa yi //
T10TD4182E:44a-23: sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa bstan 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:44a-24: nyi ma zla ba nyid thob rang lus kyi //
T10TD4182E:44a-25: 'od kyis 'jig rten mtha' dag snang byas te //
T10TD4182E:44a-26: slar yang mun nag smag tu phyin gyur nas //
T10TD4182E:44a-27: rang gi lag pa brkyang ba'ang mi mthong 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:44a-28: de ltar nongs par 'gyur 'tshal bsod nams ni //
T10TD4182E:44a-29: rnam gsum mar me'i snang ba rab bzhes shig / gcig pu nyi ma zla bas mi brdzi ba'i //
T10TD4182E:44a-30: mun nag mtha' yas nang du 'jug 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:44a-31: sems can nyes par spyad pa spyod rnams la //
T10TD4182E:44a-32: yang sos thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang //
T10TD4182E:44a-33: bsdus 'joms du 'bod mnar med la sogs pa'i //
T10TD4182E:44a-34: dmyal ba rnams su rtag tu sdug bsngal 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:44a-35: kha cig til bzhin 'tshir te de bzhin gzhan //
T10TD4182E:44a-36: phyem zhib mo bzhin du phye mar rlog / kha cig sog les 'dra ste de bzhin gzhan //
T10TD4182E:44a-37: sta re mi bzad so rnon rnams kyis gshags //
T10TD4182E:44a-38: de bzhin gzhan dag khro chu bzhu ba yi //
T10TD4182E:44a-39: khu ba 'bar ba 'khrigs pa ldud par bgyid //
T10TD4182E:44a-40: kha cig lcags kyi gsal shing rab 'bar ba //
T10TD4182E:44a-41: cher ma can la kun du rgyud par bgyid //
T10TD4182E:44a-42: kha cig lcags kyis mche ba ldan pa'i khyi //
T10TD4182E:44b-0: @44b gtum pos dbad cing lag ba gnam du bsgreng //
T10TD4182E:44b-1: dbang med gzhan ngag lcags mchu rnon po dang //
T10TD4182E:44b-2: sen mo mi bzad ldan pa'i khva rnams 'thog / kha cig srin bu sbur ba sna tshogs dang //
T10TD4182E:44b-3: sha sbrang sbrang bu mchu rings khri phrag dag / reg na mi bzad rma srol cher 'byin pas //
T10TD4182E:44b-4: za bar bgyid cing 'gre ldog smre sngags 'don //
T10TD4182E:44b-5: kha cig mdag me 'bar ba'i tshogs su ni //
T10TD4182E:44b-6: rgyun mi 'chad bar rab bsreg kha yang bgrad //
T10TD4182E:44b-7: kha cig lcags las byas pa'i zangs chen du //
T10TD4182E:44b-8: spyi'u tshugs 'bras kyi cung 'phed bzhin du 'tshed //
T10TD4182E:44b-9: sdig can dbugs 'byung 'gags pa tsam zhig gi / dus kyis bar du chod rnams dmyal ba yi //
T10TD4182E:44b-10: sdug bsngal gzhal yas thos nas rnam stong du //
T10TD4182E:44b-11: mi 'jig gang lags rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
T10TD4182E:44b-12: dmyal ba bris pa mthong dang thos ba dang //
T10TD4182E:44b-13: dran dang bklags dang gzugs su bgyis rnams kyang //
T10TD4182E:44b-14: 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur na mi bzad pa'i //
T10TD4182E:44b-15: rnam smin nyams su myong na smos ci 'tshal //
T10TD4182E:44b-16: bde ba kun gyi nang na sred zad pa //
T10TD4182E:44b-17: bde ba'i bdag por bgyid pa ji lta bar //
T10TD4182E:44b-18: de bzhin sdug bsngal kun gyi nang na ni //
T10TD4182E:44b-19: mnar med dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rab mi bzad //
T10TD4182E:44b-20: 'di na nyin gcig mdung thung sum brgya yis //
T10TD4182E:44b-21: rab tu drag btab sdug bsngal gang lags pa //
T10TD4182E:44b-22: des ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chung ngu la'ang //
T10TD4182E:44b-23: 'ol yang mi bgyid char yang mi phod de //
T10TD4182E:44b-24: de ltar sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad lo //
T10TD4182E:44b-25: bye ba phrag brgyar nyams su myong yang ni //
T10TD4182E:44b-26: ji srid mi dge de zad ma gyur pa //
T10TD4182E:44b-27: de srid srog dang 'bal bar mi 'gyur ro //
T10TD4182E:44b-28: mi dge'i 'bras 'di rnams kyi sa bon ni //
T10TD4182E:44b-29: lus ngag yid kyi nyes spyad khyod kyis ni //
T10TD4182E:44b-30: ci nas de rdul tsam yang ma mchis pa //
T10TD4182E:44b-31: de ltar nyid kyi rtsal gyis 'bad par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:44b-32: dud 'gro'i skye gnas na yang gsod pa dang //
T10TD4182E:44b-33: bcings dang brdeg sogs sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa ;
T10TD4182E:44b-34: / zhi 'gyur dge ba spangs pa rnams la ni //
T10TD4182E:44b-35: gcig la gcig za shin tu ma bzad pa //
T10TD4182E:44b-36: kha cig mu tig bal dang rus pa dang //
T10TD4182E:44b-37: sha dang pags pa'i ched du 'chi bar 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:44b-38: dbang med gzhan dag rdog pa lag pa dang /
T10TD4182E:44b-39: lcags dang lcags kyu 'debs pas btab ste bkol //
T10TD4182E:45a-0: @45a * // yi dags na yang 'dod pas phongs pa yis //
T10TD4182E:45a-1: bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal rgyun chags mi 'chos pa //
T10TD4182E:45a-2: bkres skom grang dro ngal dang 'jigs pa yis //
T10TD4182E:45a-3: bskyed pa shin tu mi bzad bsten 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:45a-4: kha cig kha ni khab kyi mig tsam la //
T10TD4182E:45a-5: lto ba ri yi gtos tsam bkres pas nye na //
T10TD4182E:45a-6: mi gtsang gyi nar bor ba cung zad kyang //
T10TD4182E:45a-7: 'tshal ba'i mthu dang ldan pa ma lags so //
T10TD4182E:45a-8: kha cig pags rus lus shing gcer bu ste //
T10TD4182E:45a-9: ta la'i yang tog bskams pa lta bu lags //
T10TD4182E:45a-10: kha cig mtshan zhing kha nas 'bar ba ste //
T10TD4182E:45a-11: zas su 'bar ba'i khar babs byem 'tshal //
T10TD4182E:45a-12: smad rigs 'ga' ni rnag dang phyis dang //
T10TD4182E:45a-13: khrag sogs mi gtsang ba yang mi rnyed de //
T10TD4182E:45a-14: phan tshun gdong du 'tshog cing mgrin pa nas //
T10TD4182E:45a-15: wa ba byung ba smin pa'i rnag 'tshal lo //
T10TD4182E:45a-16: yi dags rnams la sos ka'i dus su ni //
T10TD4182E:45a-17: zla ba'ang tshal dgun ni nyi ma'ang grang //
T10TD4182E:45a-18: ljon shing 'bras bu med 'gyur 'di dag gis //
T10TD4182E:45a-19: bltas pa tsam gyis klung yang bskam par 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:45a-20: bar chad med par sdug bsngal rten gyur pa //
T10TD4182E:45a-21: nyes par spyad pa'i las kyi zhags pa ni //
T10TD4182E:45a-22: sra bas bcings pa'i lus can kha cig lo //
T10TD4182E:45a-23: lnga stong dag dang khrir yang 'chi mi 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:45a-24: de ltar yi dags rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i //
T10TD4182E:45a-25: sdug bsngal ro gcig thob pa gang lags pa //
T10TD4182E:45a-26: de yi rgyu ni skye bo 'jungs dga' ba //
T10TD4182E:45a-27: ser sna 'phags min lags par sangs rgyas gsungs //
T10TD4182E:45a-28: mtho ris na yang bde chen de dag gi /'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal nyid ni de bas che //
T10TD4182E:45a-29: de ltar bsams nas ya rabs rnams kyis ni //
T10TD4182E:45a-30: zad 'gyur mtho ris slad du sred mi bgyi //
T10TD4182E:45a-31: lus kyi kha dog mi sdug 'gyur ba dang //
T10TD4182E:45a-32: stan la mi dga' me tog phreng rnying dang //
T10TD4182E:45a-33: gos la dri ma chags dang lus las ni //
T10TD4182E:45a-34: sngon chad med pa'i rdul 'byung zhes bgyi ba //
T10TD4182E:45a-35: mtho ris 'chi 'pho spron bgyid 'chi ltas lnga //
T10TD4182E:45a-36: lha yul gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'byung ste //
T10TD4182E:45a-37: sa steng mi rnams 'che bar 'gyur ba dag / sbron par byed pa'i 'chi ltas rnams dang 'dra //
T10TD4182E:45a-38: lha yi 'jig rten dag nas 'phos pa la //
T10TD4182E:45a-39: gal te dge ba'i lhag ma 'ga' med na //
T10TD4182E:45b-0: de nas dbang med @45b dud 'gro yi dags dang //
T10TD4182E:45b-1: dmyal bar gnas pa gang yang rung bar 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:45b-2: lha min dag na'ang rang bzhin gyis lha yi //
T10TD4182E:45b-3: dpal la sdang phyir yid kyi sdug bsngal che //
T10TD4182E:45b-4: de dag blo ngad ldan yang 'gro ba yi //
T10TD4182E:45b-5: sgrib pas bden pa mthong ba ma mchis so //
T10TD4182E:45b-6: 'khor ba de 'dra lags pas lha mi dang //
T10TD4182E:45b-7: dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro rnams dag tu //
T10TD4182E:45b-8: skye ba bzang po ma lags skye ba ni //
T10TD4182E:45b-9: gnod ba du ma'i snod gyur lags mkhyen mdzod //
T10TD4182E:45b-10: mgo'am gos la glo bur ne shor na //
T10TD4182E:45b-11: de dag bzlog phyir bgyi ba btang nas kyang //
T10TD4182E:45b-12: yang srid med par bgyi slad 'bad 'tshal te //
T10TD4182E:45b-13: de bas ches mchog dgos pa gzhan ma mchis //
T10TD4182E:45b-14: tshul khrims dag dang bsam gtan shes rab kyis //
T10TD4182E:45b-15: mya ngan 'das zhi dul ba dri med pa'i //
T10TD4182E:45b-16: go 'phang mi rga mi 'chi zad mi 'tshal //
T10TD4182E:45b-17: sa chu me rlung nyi zla bral thob mdzod //
T10TD4182E:45b-18: dran dang chos rab 'byed dang brtson 'grus dang //
T10TD4182E:45b-19: dga' dang shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin dang //
T10TD4182E:45b-20: btang snyoms 'di bdun byang chub yan lag ste //
T10TD4182E:45b-21: mya ngan 'das thob bgyid pa'i dge tshogs lags //
T10TD4182E:45b-22: shes rab med par bsam gtan yod min te //
T10TD4182E:45b-23: bsam gtan med par yang ni shes rab med //
T10TD4182E:45b-24: gang la de nyid yod pas srid pa yi //
T10TD4182E:45b-25: rgya mtsho gnag rjes lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi //
T10TD4182E:45b-26: lung ma bstan pa bcu bzhi 'jig rten na //
T10TD4182E:45b-27: nyi ma'i gnyen gyis rab gsungs gang dag lags //
T10TD4182E:45b-28: de dag rnams la bsam par mi bgyi ste //
T10TD4182E:45b-29: de yis blo ni zhi bar bgyid ma lags //
T10TD4182E:45b-30: ma rig pa las las te de la sa ni //
T10TD4182E:45b-31: rnam shes de las ming dang gzugs rab 'byung //
T10TD4182E:45b-32: de las skye mched drug ste de las ni //
T10TD4182E:45b-33: reg pa kun du 'byung bar thub pas gsungs //
T10TD4182E:45b-34: reg pa las ni tshor ba kun 'byung ste //
T10TD4182E:45b-35: tshor ba'i gzhi las sred pa 'byung par 'gyur //
T10TD4182E:45b-36: sred pas len pa bskyed par 'gyur ba ste //
T10TD4182E:45b-37: de las srid pa srid las skye ba lags ;
T10TD4182E:45b-38: / skye ba yod na mya ngan na rga dang //
T10TD4182E:45b-39: 'dod pas phongs dang 'chi dang 'jigs sogs kyi //
T10TD4182E:45b-40: sdug bsngal phung po shin tu che 'byung ste //
T10TD4182E:45b-42: rten cing 'brel par 'byung 'di rgyal ba yi //
T10TD4182E:46a-0: gsung gi mdzod kyi gces pa zab @46a * //
T10TD4182E:46a-2: / gang gis 'di ni yang dag mthong ba des //
T10TD4182E:46a-3: sangs rgyas de nyid rig pas rnam mchog mthong //
T10TD4182E:46a-4: yang dag lta dang 'tsho dang rtsol ba dang //
T10TD4182E:46a-5: dran dang ting 'dzin dag dang las mtha' dag / yang dag rtog nyid lam gyi yan lag brgyad //
T10TD4182E:46a-6: 'di ni zhi bar bgyi slad bsgom par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:46a-7: skye 'di sdug bsngal sred pa zhes bgyi ba //
T10TD4182E:46a-8: de ni de yi kun 'byung rgya chen te //
T10TD4182E:46a-9: 'di 'gog pa ni thar pa lags te de //
T10TD4182E:46a-10: 'thob bgyid 'phags lam yan lag de brgyad lags //
T10TD4182E:46a-11: de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag / mthong bar bgyi slad rtag tu brtson par bgyi //
T10TD4182E:46a-12: pang na dpal gnas khyim pa rnams kyis kyang //
T10TD4182E:46a-13: shes pas nyon mongs chu bo las brgal gyi //
T10TD4182E:46a-14: gang dag chos mngon bgyis pa de dag kyang //
T10TD4182E:46a-15: gnam las babs pa ma lags lo tog bzhin //
T10TD4182E:46a-16: sa rum las 'thon ma lags de dag sngon //
T10TD4182E:46a-17: nyon mongs rag las so so'i skye bor bas //
T10TD4182E:46a-18: bsnyengs dang bral la mang du gsol ci 'tshal //
T10TD4182E:46a-19: phan pa'i gdams ngag don po 'di lags te //
T10TD4182E:46a-20: khyod kyis thugs dul mdzod cig bcom ldan gyis //
T10TD4182E:46a-21: sems ni chos kyi rtsa ba lags par gsungs //
T10TD4182E:46a-22: khyod la de skad gdams pa gang lags de //
T10TD4182E:46a-23: bas par dge slong gis kyang bgyi bar dka' //
T10TD4182E:46a-24: 'di la gang zhig spyod pa'i ngo bo de'i //
T10TD4182E:46a-25: yon tan bstan pas sku tshe don yod mdzod //
T10TD4182E:46a-26: kun gyi dge ba kun la yi rang zhing //
T10TD4182E:46a-27: nyid kyi legs par spyad pa rnam gsum yang //
T10TD4182E:46a-28: sangs rgyas nyid thob bgyi slad yongs bsngos nas //
T10TD4182E:46a-29: de nas dge ba'i phung po 'di yis khyod //
T10TD4182E:46a-30: skye ba dpag tu med par lha mi yi //
T10TD4182E:46a-31: 'jig rten kun gyi rnal 'byor dbang mdzad nas //
T10TD4182E:46a-32: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang spyod pa yis //
T10TD4182E:46a-33: 'gro ba nyam thag mang po rjes bzung ste //
T10TD4182E:46a-34: 'khrungs nas na rga 'dod chags zhe sdang rnams //
T10TD4182E:46a-35: bsal te sangs rgyas zhing du bcom ldan 'das //
T10TD4182E:46a-36: 'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi //
T10TD4182E:46a-37: mgon po sku tshe dpag tu med par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:46a-38: shes rab tshul khrims gtong 'byung grags chen dri ma med //
T10TD4182E:46a-39: lha yul nam mkha' dang ni sa steng rgyas mdzad nas //
T10TD4182E:46b-0: sa la mi dang mtho ris lha ni @46b na chung mchog / bde dags dga' ba nges par rab tu zhi mdzad de //
T10TD4182E:46b-1: nyon mongs nyam thag sems can tshogs kyi 'jigs skye dang //
T10TD4182E:46b-2: 'chi ba zhi mdzad rgyal ba'i dbang po nyid brnyes nas //
T10TD4182E:46b-3: 'jig rten las 'das ming tsam zhi la mi bskyengs pa //
T10TD4182E:46b-4: mi bgres nongs pa mi mnga'i go 'phar brnyes par mdzod //
T10TD4182E:46b-5: bshes pa'i spring yig slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis //
T10TD4182E:46b-6: mdza' bo rgyal po bde spyod la bskur ba rdzogs so /
T10TD4182E:46b-8: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan pos sarba dznya de ba dang /
T10TD4182E:46b-9: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban da dpal ba rtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
